message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $16,000.  I'm open to discussing further.
I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective.  While I value this product highly, I'm willing to come down to $14,500. I believe this price reflects the true worth of what's being offered.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $13,000?
